plugin.name: Dead Code Eliminator
plugin.description: Detects and eliminates dead code in obfuscated binaries.
plugin.longdescription: This plugin recursively calculates a set of def-use chains in a binary. This allows us to segment the benign code from the interesting code by tracing these def-use chains backwards, as most of the dummy code should be fairly isolated from the malicious code.
